meanings.definition: Having parts that are close together; compact
meanings.sent1: The cake batter became denser as I added more flour.
meanings.sent2: The forest became denser as we ventured deeper into it.
meanings.sent3: The puzzle pieces fit together perfectly, creating a denser picture.
meanings.sent4: The fog grew denser, enveloping everything in a mysterious haze.
meanings.sent5: The crowd in the small room felt denser as more people squeezed in.

meanings.definition: Having a high mass or specific gravity
meanings.sent1: The denser rock sank to the bottom of the river.
meanings.sent2: Gold is denser than most other metals.
meanings.sent3: The dense cake was too heavy to lift with one hand.
meanings.sent4: The denser liquid settled at the bottom of the container.
meanings.sent5: The denser material caused the scale to tip in that direction.

meanings.sent1: The denser the color, the more vibrant the painting looked.
meanings.sent2: The denser the flavor, the more delicious the dish tasted.
meanings.sent3: The denser the scent, the more inviting the room felt.
meanings.sent4: The denser the music, the more captivating the performance became.
meanings.sent5: The denser the emotion, the more powerful the impact on the audience.
